page.title: 06TRANSPORT BALBY DONCASTER
page.content: The A630 (Balby Rd) runs across the north of the area leading west to the A1 and Sheffield. Other main roads are Tickhill Rd.once a turnpike and the M18. There are 2 major bus routes and 2 special ones. The major ones run from Doncaster to Weston Rd. and Tickhill Rd.and the specials take children to Balby Carr School and workers to the Carr Hill Industrial Estate. Railways came late to the area in 1849 with the G.N.R. but developed rapidly until now the whole area is dissected by loop lines and marshalling yards many of which are disused today.Now the east coast line which enables people to travel to London is to be elctrified.
